reviewText: Do not buy this if you are in the US. It's a region B.  I did not see any notification that it was.  Sending it back.  Disappointed.
Love the anime its so good more there's more to come

This Series will only play in Austraila and New Zealand , there was no noticeable warning about that little detail. Now we have a Blue Exorcist Complete Series that we can not watch and no one will help to refund us on this item!
Wasn't clear at first in post whether it was playable everywhere should be bold and next to the picture I'm buying something not reading the fine print
